Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1979...
Injured on 6/15/1979 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/1983 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 4/27/1984...
Had first career hit on 5/13/1985, off Fred Myers (NE)...
Released by Plum Grove on 8/4/1988...
